review: Ordered this based on the excellent reviews and the price. Needed to add a 3rd streaming player to our home.  We have a Roku 1 and an original AppleTV (I'm an early adopter).  I swapped out the AppleTV for the Fire Stick in my main room to add Amazon Prime streaming in that room.The Fire Stick would not maintain a connection to my wifi.  We never were able to stream anything after an hour of troubleshooting using both online and direct contact with Amazon customer service (3 reps: 2 useless, 1 polite but not helpful).  I WAS ACTUALLY TOLD BY TWO AMAZON REPS THAT THE FIRE STICK WOULD ONLY WORK IF WAS WITHIN A 5FT RANGE OF THE ROUTER!!!  They've been hearing a lot of the same complaint and were working on a software update. Seriously??Unplugged it and sent it back for a full refund - within the 30 day window.  Not waiting for an update that may or may not happen.  Hooked old AppleTV back up and was back in business (minus Amazon Instant Video).
author: Desmond Laffan
